column3: I do not see any LogPrint() nor LogPrintf() in the tests... printf may be intentional.\n
Indeed, perhaps @sipa or @gavinandresen can comment. At least the comments and the change in wallet.cpp seems still be needed :).\n

ACK on the wallet.cpp and main.cpp fixes.

Unit test should not LogPrint or printf at all, the test-runner gathers output.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/9a1b4b564a13f5d717538c89762e88b6eaf83525 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK after getting rid of the tests/ changes\n
Reverted the test changes... @gavinandresen I don't want to touch the tests, you are free to remove any output related stuff that shouldn't be in there.\n
